review: Have known Dr. Shah for more than a decade now as a patient. He is a genial human being with respect for older patients like me as I have undergone multiple cardiac related problems and my dental treatment needs certain tenderness in treatment approach. My grateful heartfelt blessings to him.
reply_text: Thank you Sir for those kind words...We at our practice strive to give utmost attention and care to all our patients ..Appreciate your positive feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Kaushal is the right person to go to if you are looking for precise treatment. Not only is he a considerate soul but also an understanding human being. My 5 year old son likes to visit him only for his nursing bottle caries problem. His patience in dealing with a patient is commendable. He knows his job well and explains the entire situation. Most important is his smiling face and polite tone which soothes any anxious patient and makes him/ her comfortable. For 360¬∞ Solution to your Dental Problems Dr. Kaushal's diagnosis is highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review:
Dr Kaushal is superb and is a one stop solution to all my dental problems. 
He will never suggest you anything wrong and over and above what is needed, like other dentist he will not want to charge you anything random. But will give you the best suggested and pocket friendly treatment. 

He will explain exactly what is the issue and what is the treatment. He also will explain the whole treatment step by step. And his hands are blessed, you won't even come to know that you were operated.
